entry.title: Solana Soars Into Top Four Amid SLERF Meme Coin Snafu
entry.summary: While Solana has been rallying, the ecosystem has been reeling from an issue with the SLERF meme coin launch.

entry.title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
entry.summary: UPDATED: Crypto gamers can still get in on airdrops for Notcoin, BlockGames, Upland, Nyan Heroes, and more. Here's what you need to know.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Hits All-Time High, Then Gets Battered, While Solana Soars
entry.summary: Bitcoin soared above $73,600 per coin before dropping below $69,000. But Solana made gains, with its market cap hitting an all-time high.

entry.title: Mercedes-Benz to Put AI in Its Assembly Line Robots
entry.summary: The seven-year-old robotics firm says the deal with the automaker is a ”dream scenario.”

entry.title: ‘Parallel’ Creator Details ‘Colony’ AI Game on Solana, Pushing PRIME to All-Time High Price
entry.summary: The makers of hot Ethereum NFT game Parallel are shifting to Solana for their next game, an AI-driven “survival sim” called Colony.

entry.title: Dogwifhat Spat? Ethereum NFT Auction Reveals Tensions Between Dog’s Owners and Solana Community
entry.summary: The owners of the actual "Dogwifhat" meme canine are trying to get a piece of the $3 billion phenomenon that they started. So why are people upset?

entry.summary: Nyan Heroes developer 9 Lives Interactive revealed the early access timeline this week alongside word of a new funding round.

entry.title: Bitcoin Runes Launch at the Halving: Here's Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: The creator of Bitcoin’s Ordinals protocol is debuting a new fungible token standard to rival BRC-20. Here’s everything we know about Runes.

entry.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Should Get Up to 50 Years in Prison, $11 Billion Fine: DOJ
entry.summary: The U.S. Department of Justice set out its sentencing recommendations Friday after FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried was found guilty last year.

entry.title: Starbucks Is Shutting Down Its Odyssey Beta NFT Rewards Program—Will It Return?
entry.summary: Starbucks Odyssey is shutting down this month, and it's unclear whether the Polygon-based NFT rewards program will be revived.

entry.summary: Solana's market cap is surging and hit a new all-time high late Friday as SOL hits its highest price since December 2021.

entry.title: Bitcoin SV Down 22% Since Court Ruled Craig Wright Isn’t Satoshi
entry.summary: BSV fell hard after the UK courts declared Wright not to be Satoshi Nakamoto, but the BSV faithful remain defiant.

entry.title: Most Public Bitcoin Mining Firms Will Survive the Halving: Analysis
entry.summary: Mining firms like CleanSpark and Bitdeer have nothing to fear in April—as long as Bitcoin’s price doesn’t crash.

entry.title: Bitcoin Blowout: Plunging Crypto Prices Trigger $800 Million in Liquidations
entry.summary: It’s another bloodbath for traders betting on crypto prices, with Bitcoin and Ethereum positions leading the latest round of liquidations.

entry.title: Activision Blizzard Twitter Account Hacked to Shill Solana Crypto Scam
entry.summary: The ATVI coin really is live on Solana, but it is not an official token of Call of Duty publisher Activision Blizzard—despite the tweets.

entry.title: MicroStrategy's Leveraged Bitcoin Buys Could Lead to 'Severe Deleveraging' If Market Drops, Says JP Morgan
entry.summary: JP Morgan warned that introducing more leverage into Bitcoin markets could make a potential correction all the more painful.

entry.summary: Developers can now utilize Aptos Labs’ blockchain gaming suite, which includes a collaboration with Google Cloud for live service games.

entry.title: Upland Reveals 'Share and Build' Airdrop Drive Ahead of Ethereum Token Launch
entry.summary: Crypto game Upland is gearing up to debut its Sparklet token, and will reward users via in-game missions and social media engagement.

entry.summary: A University of York researcher used ChatGPT to play classic first-person shooter—and the results were painful.

entry.title: El Salvador Bitcoin Treasury Is a Lot Bigger Than We Thought

entry.title: Check Your Wallets: Bitcoin Ordinals Runestones Are Being Airdropped
entry.summary: Early Bitcoin Ordinals faithful will be rewarded with 112,383 Runestones airdropped to Bitcoin wallets over the next 48 hours.

entry.title: Telegram Game 'Notcoin' Giving Out $400K in TON, Plus Millions of In-Game Coins
entry.summary: Viral clicker game Notcoin just launched a new promo ahead of the airdrop, offering up 100,000 Toncoin and heaps of in-game coins.

entry.title: Crypto Holders Favor Donald Trump for U.S. President: Poll
entry.summary: Younger voters of color are increasingly adopting cryptocurrencies, making holders a potential swing vote in a tight race.

entry.title: This is The Time of SOL
entry.summary: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.

entry.title: ‘Spider-Man’ and ‘X-Men’ NFT Comics Hit Ethereum in VeVe's New App
entry.summary: Digital collectibles platform VeVe goes deeper into the comic book game with a dedicated app that features Marvel Comics NFTs.

entry.title: Project Awakening Preview: Eve Online Crypto Game ‘Literally Wants to Kill You’
entry.summary: PREVIEW: CCP Games CEO Hilmar Veigar Pétursson tells GG all about Project Awakening, the on-chain evolution of Eve Online.

entry.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $69,000 as Grayscale Moves Over $400 Million in BTC to Coinbase
entry.summary: A continued Grayscale sell-off added downward pressure to hot U.S. inflation figures announced Thursday.

entry.title: 'MadWorld' Mobile NFT Shooter Launches in Early Access as Studio Raises $11 Million
entry.summary: Carbonated Inc. reveals backing by Andreessen Horowitz and Com2uS as its iOS and Android game MadWorld begins testing.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.

entry.title: Dogecoin Pumps As Elon Musk Says Tesla ‘Should Enable’ Purchases With Meme Coin
entry.summary: The tech billionaire still calls Dogecoin “the people’s crypto.”

entry.title: Memes Continue Run: Dogwifhat, Bonk, and Pepe Jump Double Digits
entry.summary: These meme coins and tokens are still flying, unshaken by the latest inflation data.

entry.title: SuperRare Expands Beyond Ethereum NFTs Into Bitcoin Ordinals Artwork
entry.summary: Long-running Ethereum NFT art platform SuperRare is embracing Bitcoin Ordinals via a collection from artist Killer Acid in April.

entry.title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.

entry.title: BITCOIN HITS $72,000!
entry.summary: BTC hits new ATH of $72k, flips Silver market cap. Wick lower then higher causes $350m liquidations. London Stock Exchange to consider crypto ETNs. Funding again soars before ETF buying begins. Crypto saw record $2.7bn inflows last week. MicroStrategy buys another $821m of BTC.

entry.title: BTC HITS 70K!
entry.summary: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.

entry.title: Live With Raoul Pal
entry.summary: SOL up 10%, Pantera raising $250m to buy from FTX. Market flat but spot buyers begin to drive volumes.

entry.title: Streamlining Blockchain: Demystifying Real-Time Insights & Simplifying Data Management
entry.summary: Discover how to navigate and overcome the complexities of blockchain data management with QuickNode’s Streams. This webinar, guided by our seasoned experts Nick Yushkevich and Carl DiClementi, provides you with actionable insights into tackling common challenges faced by businesses in the blockchain space. From real-time data streaming that ensures timely decision-making to robust error handling mechanisms that guarantee data integrity, and comprehensive observability features that offer deep insights into your blockchain operations, we’ll cover how QuickNode’s infrastructure is tailored to enhance operational efficiency, scalability, and innovation.

entry.title: DOGS ON TOP!
entry.summary: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.

entry.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'
entry.summary: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'
entry.summary: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains
entry.summary: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.

entry.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain
entry.summary: Improbable's Rob Whitehead joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse technology firm's collaborations with blue-chip NFT collections, and how adding tens of thousands of players to a game will work in practice.
